description: The political frenzy is heightening over a so-called migrant caravan heading toward the United States, but who are the people making the grueling journey? We spent 24 hours with a family as they trekked through Mexico for an up-close view of what’s at stake.
title: A Day on the Road With the Migrant Caravan
title_page: A Day on the Road With the Migrant Caravan - Video - NYTimes.com
